title: Dave Bautista
summary: David Michael Bautista Jr. (born January 18, 1969) is an American actor and former professional wrestler. As a professional wrestler, he is known for his time in WWE from 2002 to 2010, in 2014, and one final run in 2018â€“2019. Outside of professional wrestling, he is known for his acting career, most notably as the character Drax the Destroyer in the Marvel Cinematic Universe.
